Uses of Interface
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.EmbeddedMediaPlayer

  • Packages that use EmbeddedMediaPlayer 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component
    Provides higher-level components used to create basic media players with the minimum of application code.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player
    This is the main package for vlcj client applications, providing the classes necessary to create and control native media players and associated resources.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.directaudio
    Provides the classes necessary to support direct access to the native audio samples buffer.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded
    Provides the classes necessary to support the embedding of native media player video output in Swing/AWT user interface components.

    • Uses of EmbeddedMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component

      Methods in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component that return EmbeddedMediaPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EmbeddedMediaPlayer EmbeddedMediaPlayerComponent.getMediaPlayer()
      Get the embedded media player reference.

    • Uses of EmbeddedMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player

      Methods in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player that return EmbeddedMediaPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EmbeddedMediaPlayer MediaPlayerFactory.newEmbeddedMediaPlayer()
      Create a new embedded media player.
      EmbeddedMediaPlayer MediaPlayerFactory.newEmbeddedMediaPlayer(FullScreenStrategy fullScreenStrategy)
      Create a new embedded media player.

    • Uses of EmbeddedMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.directaudio

      Subinterfaces of EmbeddedMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.directaudio 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DirectAudioPlayer
      Specification for a media player that provides direct access to the audio buffer data.
      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.directaudio that implement EmbeddedMediaPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultDirectAudioPlayer
      Media player implementation that provides direct access to the audio buffer data.

    • Uses of EmbeddedMediaPlayer in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded that implement EmbeddedMediaPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultEmbeddedMediaPlayer
      Implementation of a media player that renders video to an embedded Canvas component.
